mapper.insert: insert into reservation (rv_id, m_title, start_dt, end_dt, rv_user, rv_writer,reg_dt) values (reserv_seq.nextval, #{m_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{start_dt}), TO_DATE(#{end_dt}), #{rv_user}, #{rv_writer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select m.m_id, m.m_name, r.m_id from meetingroom m left join reservation r on r.m_id = m.m_id where m.m_id = #{m_id}
